CatDescriptText: Signs on walls read "For Skating Smoothly...Lightly...Silently...There is no finer skate than the new Action 1953 'Chicago' Roller Skate Company" "'Chicago' presents the Gold Medalist" "Now! The Finest Line of Custom Crafted Rink Skates, 3 Great New Performers Sold Exclusively by Rink Operators, The Chicago Deluxe Custom, The Chicago Imperial Custom, The Precisionette Custom, Peak Performance, Assured Quality, Prestige and Protection, Chicago Roller Skate Company, Pro-Tek-Toe" "Skaters Look!  Get All Your Latest Styles in Shoes and Skates, Of Precision and Semi-Precision in Chicago and Cleveland Brands.  Also For the Girls.  Skirts and Tights Etc. at Reasonable Prices.  Parts of Chicago and Cleveland Skates Sold Here and Repairs on All Skates Made.  See-Manager." "Price List, Chicago V.T. Precision Shoes and Skates... Cleveland Precision Shoes... Chicago+Cleveland Semi... Chicago Ball Bearing... Also......Special... Brand Shoe Skates $11.00-$18.00 Deluxe Toe St... Sure Grip Toe... Pro-Tek Toe St...Large Allumin..."
TitMainTitle: Seven men wearing Bermuda shorts, diagonally striped ties, and dark knee socks, possibly including Horace Hord on right end, and woman wearing sequined dress with fur collar, posed in interior with advertisements for roller skates
